data.text: The Use of a Seat Pack on a Dropper Post
Is it ok to use a seat pack on a dropper post?

Perfectly ok, the question is whether you want to use the dropper post while having a bag or not. If yes, then you need to choose bag with proper mount + stuff like Wolf Tooth Valais, so that your bag strap don't hit the dropper entry. I use Ortlieb Seat pack size M, that's because it has one strap that's pretty high on the post. Combined with Valais I still use dropper, just with slightly reduced travel.
